tagline: Automatically downloads TV show episodes based on you schedule and uploads to Dropbox
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Shloader
body:
Automatically downloads TV show episodes based on you schedule and uploads to Dropbox or whatever

Currently works with myshows.ru to get user's schedule, thepiratebay.com to find torrents, transmission to download episodes, and Dropbox to upload downloaded files so you can watch the shows on your iPad or other mobile device.
